data.text: @MadParticipant @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Holler upstairs and say what’s up to mom for me.
@PierreGHB @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Yea definitely, it’s been absolutely horrifying 🤣
@MadParticipant @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Right. But I remain the one who isn’t horrified by a jab and a fucking layer of cloth over my mouth and nose.
@PierreGHB @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Lol. Sure thing dude. You were def right, everyone else was just scared, but not you. What a hero !

@MadParticipant @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Nah, I was just listening to the scientific consensus. To help myself, my family, and my community. You, though: looking deeper for answers that weren’t there, a fucking pussy afraid of masks and needles. Shit happens and it sucks, buck up. Grow a pair.
@PierreGHB @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov You are projecting. Scared was you living the last year like it was more dangerous than it is now.
@MadParticipant @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov Hahahaha okay, whatever makes you less scared.

@PierreGHB @Syllogasm1 @studiowilson @GovDanMcKee @CDCgov My thoughts? We never pcr tested every single person in the hospital to see if they had influenza before. Bet we could pump those numbers up quite a bit if we tried.
